name: Coop Directional Mayhem
description:
Hello this game is a cooperative game involve multiple players moving various key cube to its destination with a twist on the movement mechanics. This game can be played with as many players as your keyboard can handle, while the game can be played alone it is not recommended. Enjoy, and thank you for playing.

NOTE: I FORGOT TO MENTION IN THE TUTORIAL, THE PLAYER WHO CONTROL THE MOUSE CAN RIGHT CLICK ON THE CUBE TO RESET ITS POSITION, JUST IN CASE THE CUBE DECIDED TO FLY AWAY.

Warning: do not full screen the game, the map will be cropped.
